title-group.article-title: HIGH PRECISION COMPUTATION OF RIEMANN'S ZETA FUNCTION BY THE RIEMANN-SIEGEL FORMULA, I

abstract.p: We present rigorous and sharp bounds for the terms and remainder in the Riemann-Siegel formula (for a general argument, not necessarily on the critical line). This allows for the computation of ζ(s) and Z(t) to high precision. We also derive the Riemann-Siegel formula in a new and more direct way.
